analyzed: ādade tha śaśi kānta bhūdhara syanda bindu śiśirām sarasvatīm

analyzed: eṣa paśya patitaḥ nabhastalāt asta śaila gahaneṣu naśyati

analyzed: sandhyayā carama diś pragalbhayā bhagna sāndra kara pañjaraḥ khagaḥ

analyzed: śakyam arcitum an ucca pāṇibhiḥ pāśapāṇi nagarī nivāsibhiḥ

analyzed: sa anurodhaḥ iva dūra bandhuraḥ bandhujīva kusuma aruṇaḥ raviḥ

analyzed: bimba mūla rucirāḥ raveḥ amī recayanti gaganam gabhastayaḥ

analyzed: pūrayanti ca mahīm mahīruhām āyatāḥ pratiśarīra yaṣṭayaḥ

analyzed: svīkaroti śanakais anokaha chāyam adri śikhara sthalīḥ api

analyzed: hīyate nija vapuṣi api kramāt ātapasya mamatā tapasvinaḥ

analyzed: appateḥ diśi viceṣṭate raviḥ vyākulāḥ śakunayaḥ svananti amī

original: dhvāntadṛṣṭiviṣadarśanād dine durnivāranidhane nimīlati // Rc_2.22 //
analyzed: dhvānta dṛṣṭi viṣa darśanāt dine durnivāra nidhane nimīlati

analyzed: kīryate kṛta ravaiḥ khaga vrajaiḥ eṣa talla taṭa caitya pādapaḥ

analyzed: staumi tam divasam ārya kevalam eti samam abja bandhunā

eṣa muktagirikandaraḥ śanair vāri vāraṇapatiḥ pratiṣṭhate // Rc_2.26 //

analyzed: śīlayanti kariṇaḥ sva vāsita āvāri sairibha samūha recitam

original: mālatīvanavikāsavāsitā vānti palvalataṭāntavāyavaḥ // Rc_2.27 //
analyzed: mālatī vana vikāsa vāsitāḥ vānti palvala taṭa anta vāyavaḥ

analyzed: saṃtyajanti masṛṇam saraḥ sarit talla mūla salilāni sairibhāḥ

analyzed: saṃmukhīna ghana patra bandhanāt paśya paṅkaja vanāt anāratam

analyzed: pīta kośa makaranda saṃcayāḥ saṃcaranti madhupāḥ kumudvatīm

analyzed: na upanīta mukha mudram ambujam mukta mudram atha nā eva kairavam

original: etadīkṣitaparasparaṃ punaḥ patriyugmam apanidravaiśasam // Rc_2.30 //
analyzed: etad īkṣita parasparam punar patri yugmam apanidra vaiśasam

original: rodhasaḥ pulinam abjinīṃ tatas tām atītya bhajate kumudvatīm /
analyzed: rodhasaḥ pulinam abjinīm tatas tām atītya bhajate kumudvatīm

analyzed: tatra taptaḥ iva gāhate payaḥ sāyam ārdra virahaḥ vihaṅgamaḥ

analyzed: svīkṛtam na nalinaiḥ nimīlitam na sphuṭam kumuda kuḍmala smitam

original: etadīkṣitaparasparaṃ paraṃ mūḍham ambhasi vihaṅgamadvayam // Rc_2.32 //
analyzed: etad īkṣita parasparam param mūḍham ambhasi vihaṅgama dvayam

analyzed: jarjaram tyajati vāsara plavam na prasārayati mantharān karān

analyzed: eti adṛṣṭam avalambya kevalam vyoma vārinidhi śeṣam aṃśumān

analyzed: śrāvita āgamam iva dvija āravaiḥ dhvāntam om iti jagat pratīcchati

analyzed: trātum ūṣma rahitaḥ kṣamaḥ dhunā na sva maṇḍalam api prabhākaraḥ

analyzed: dṛśyatām udayati sma yādṛśaḥ tādṛśaḥ taraṇiḥ astam īyate

analyzed: utsava vyasanayoḥ prabhuḥ vidhiḥ vikriyāsu mahatām anīśvaraḥ

analyzed: sphītam abja kulam īkṣyatām itas tallam ullasita haṃsa sārasam

analyzed: niścala accha parimaṇḍala udaka prānta manthara mṛṇāla kaṇṭakam

analyzed: śīlayanti acala mekhalāsu amī śītalāsu ruravaḥ nirudyamāḥ

analyzed: pūrva śaṣpaka bala anuvartinaḥ stoka cañcala mukhāḥ sukhāsikām

analyzed: dīdhitīḥ paricitāḥ parityajati abjinīḥ api ca na anurudhyate

analyzed: sandhyayā varuṇa diś vadhūm anuprāpitaḥ kam api rāgam aṃśumān

analyzed: dyauḥ ravi indu rahitā api nirmalā bhūḥ avṛkṣa salilā api śītalā

analyzed: antarālam avalambya śobhate vāsa rakṣaṇa dayoḥ kṣaṇam jagat

analyzed: nirjharaḥ yam iyam āpagā saraḥ palvalam ca vimalam vibhāti adaḥ

analyzed: yatra cittam iha paryupāsyatām tatra tatrabhavatī pitṛ prasūḥ

analyzed: iti ubhau vyavahita antara vyathau tau samāpya samaya ucitam vidhim

analyzed: satkṛtim dadhatuḥ ānane mithas prārthanām kim api rāma lakṣmaṇau

analyzed: yatra vāti na kumudvatī marut kaumudī bata na yatra vīkṣyate

analyzed: tam nirūpita samantam añjasā bhejatuḥ parisaram raghu udvahau

analyzed: dṛṣṭi pāṇi tala ppāta śodhitām uddhṛta sthagita kaṇṭaka avaṭām

analyzed: astṛṇāt nava tṛṇena medinām rāma bhadra śayanāya lakṣmaṇaḥ

analyzed: nirṇineja sahasā suṣupsataḥ pāda padma yugam agrajanmanaḥ

analyzed: sva aṃśuka uddhṛta jalam kara abjayoḥ kauśalāt ca samavāhayat punar

analyzed: adhva jarjarita rāja lakṣaṇam lakṣmaṇaḥ caraṇam agrajanmanaḥ

analyzed: āmamarśa ciram aśru vartayan kevala upakaraṇena pāṇinā

analyzed: svairam agra kara jaiḥ vivṛtya ca vyākulām samanayat jaṭā aṭavīm

analyzed: aṅga deśam anayat vidhūya ca srasta rāti sṛtam añcalam tvacaḥ

analyzed: pārśvayoḥ upadadhe mahā iṣudhī ādade śirasi pūjitam dhanuḥ

analyzed: unmamārja dhuta saṃhṛtena ca sva añcalena punar uktam āstaram

analyzed: iti ajasram anujāta sevayā jīyamāna vana vāsa yātanaḥ

analyzed: svaptu kāmaḥ iva sa alasa indriyaḥ saṃviveśa raghunandanaḥ kṣaṇam

analyzed: mīlita unmiṣita locanaḥ śanais jāgarūkam avalokya saḥ nujam

original: uccavāmakarapaṅkajodaranyastamaulir avadan mitaṃ vacaḥ // Rc_2.49 //
analyzed: ucca vāma kara paṅkaja udara nyasta mauliḥ avadat mitam vacaḥ

analyzed: gaccha vatsa śayanīyam ātmanaḥ kliśyase kṛśataraḥ kiyat ciram

analyzed: nidrayā viśada tām vraja kṣaṇam na kṣamaḥ prati niśītha jāgaraḥ

analyzed: prātar asti bahu kṛtyam āvayoḥ bhrātar ātmani kim asi a tatparaḥ

analyzed: cintyatām uṣasi tasya saṃgatiḥ śītalasya kapi cakravartinaḥ

analyzed: āspada adhigama garvitaḥ stu vā api astu vā anudita bhūti vikriyaḥ

analyzed: āvayoḥ samaya baddhayoḥ punar niścaya artham adhigamyaḥ eva saḥ

analyzed: tat vibhātu rajanī sukhena te yāsyataḥ plavaga rāja mandiram

analyzed: pakṣayoḥ yat anurūpa muktayoḥ tat tadā eva ca samarthayiṣyate

analyzed: ūcivān iti babhūva nirvacāḥ kuḍmalīkṛta vilocana utpalaḥ

original: adhyaśeta caraṇāmbujāntikaṃ tasya joṣam anagho jaghanyajaḥ // Rc_2.54 //
analyzed: adhyaśeta caraṇa ambuja antikam tasya joṣam anaghaḥ jaghanyajaḥ

original: tatra tatra ca śayānayoś cirād vīrayor vigatasādhvasā iva /
analyzed: tatra tatra ca śayānayoḥ cirāt vīrayoḥ vigata sādhvasāḥ iva

original: uddhatair dadur ulūkahuṃkṛtair andhakārajayaghoṣaṇāṃ drumāḥ // Rc_2.55 //
analyzed: uddhataiḥ daduḥ ulūka huṃkṛtaiḥ andhakāra jaya ghoṣaṇām drumāḥ

original: vyātatoḍudaśanāpi mucyase na tvam arkacirasaṃstutādhunā /
analyzed: vyātata uḍu daśanā api mucyase na tvam arka cira saṃstutā adhunā

original: ity ariṣṭaripukūjitais tamo dyāṃ bruvāṇam iva dūram udyayau // Rc_2.56 //
analyzed: iti ariṣṭa ripu kūjitaiḥ tamaḥ dyām bruvāṇam iva dūram udyayau

analyzed: kevalam śakunayaḥ na nīḍa gāḥ śākhinaḥ pi śayitāḥ samantataḥ

original: jajñire timirataskarāvalīlupyamānavibhavāś ca bhūbhṛtaḥ // Rc_2.57 //
analyzed: jajñire timira taskara āvalī lupyamāna vibhavāḥ ca bhūbhṛtaḥ

original: na sthalī na pulinaṃ na sindhavo nācalā na taravaś cakāśire /
analyzed: na sthalī na pulinam na sindhavaḥ na acalāḥ na taravaḥ cakāśire

original: dūṣitadvitayavādam udbabhāv ekam eva timiraṃ vibhūtimat // Rc_2.58 //
analyzed: dūṣita dvitaya vādam udbabhau ekam eva timiram vibhūtimat

original: tatra mugdhapṛṣatas tamoghane pārśvagām api mṛgīm ahārayat /
analyzed: tatra mugdha pṛṣataḥ tamaḥ ghane pārśva gām api mṛgīm ahārayat

original: prāpa kokayuvatir yadṛcchayā patyur ādhitaralasya saṃgamam // Rc_2.59 //
analyzed: prāpa koka yuvatiḥ yadṛcchayā patyuḥ ādhi taralasya saṃgamam

analyzed: vṛddham aṅkam anayat śiśu bhramāt cumbati sma dayitā iti yūthapam

original: svīyam apy uditasaṃśayaḥ śanair aṅgam aṅgam amṛśad valīmukhaḥ // Rc_2.60 //
analyzed: svīyam api udita saṃśayaḥ śanais aṅgam aṅgam amṛśat valīmukhaḥ

original: sarvataḥ parigateva parvatair āciteva tarubhir nirantaram /
analyzed: sarvatas parigatā iva parvataiḥ ācitā iva tarubhiḥ nirantaram

original: āpluteva salilair itas tataḥ śakyate sma cirasaṃstutāpi bhūḥ // Rc_2.61 //
analyzed: āplutā iva salilaiḥ itas tatas śakyate sma cira saṃstutā api bhūḥ
